title: Klingspor Museum
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901142559/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Museums](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901142559/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Museums) : Klingspor Museum**

Today, the majority of old [Klingspor](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901142559/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor) foundry paraphenailia, including type specimens and books printed in Klingspor faces, as well as many handwritten pieces by [Rudolf Koch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901142559/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rudolf%20Koch) and other designers, are housed in the Klingspor Museum in Offenbach, Germany. Their website is [http://www.klingspor-museum.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901142559/http:/www.klingspor-museum.de/ "http://www.klingspor-museum.de").
author: dan_reynolds
